name: FoodTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask Food Tracker to add milk to the fridge”
”Alexa, ask Food Tracker what should I eat”
”Alexa, ask Food Tracker to suggest a recipe”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: food tracker
des:
Do you ever wonder what you have in your fridge, freezer, or pantry, whether sitting on your couch or while shopping?
Do you ever wonder how long those leftovers have been in the fridge?

Track your food with this skill, and I will let you know, wherever you are, with the website!

You can add, get, move, remove, and list food, as well as ask to suggest food or recipes. The suggested food or recipe will be using the food you have listed. If you mark a food as a condiment, I will not suggest the food. You can also ask me what's old, and I will list out the top ten oldest food, that way you can remember to eat your leftovers instead of throwing them out. 

Here are some examples of what you can say:
- Add food (a more conversational way to add food with me)
- Undo addition (Did you misspeak? Did Alexa not hear you right? This will remove the most recent food addition)
- Add milk and eggs to the fridge middle shelf
- Add milk to the fridge top shelf (can also say bottom drawer/top drawer/second drawer/anything else)
- Move milk to the fridge middle shelf
- Do I have milk?
- What's in the fridge?
- What should I eat? (or What's old? or What's old in the fridge?)
- List food from the fridge
- Suggest food
- Suggest recipe
- Remove milk
- Mark mustard as condiment
- Mark ketchup from the fridge top shelf as condiment
- Add milk to fridge top shelf to use by September 17th
- Copy my data (this will copy your data to your linked account, so you can view your food on the go. Beware: this overwrites any new data since switching to a linked account)
- add a recipe called stir fry with rice and chicken
- get my recipe called stir fry
- what are my recipes
- remove my recipe called stir fry
- Access your food and recipes on the go (or on a computer) with the website, just link your account


If you say "Alexa, open food tracker", I will also remind you of what I can do.
If you say, "Alexa, ask food tracker for help", I will list some examples of the things I can do.

Note that if you disable and enable this skill, without linking, you will lose all of your data. If you link your account, and then disable and enable with linking, your data will still be available. If you link your account after using it without linking, you need to say "give me a link" to move your old data to your linked account (this will overwrite any data in your new account).
